room_title: Escape room "Piece Meal" by Alternate Reality Escape Rooms in Houston
room_description: You slam the door behind you and bolt it. You hear screams over the sound of the chainsaw. Your body shivers and you stifle the urge to vomit. The stench of rotting flesh fills the air and you see blood - lots of blood. You can hear the sound of the chainsaw approaching. You have 60 minutes to figure out how to get out of this slice of hell before the freak with chainsaw finds his way in.
